name: The enemy weapons are better
description:
"The Enemy Weapons Are Better" is a simple, fast-paced barrage game.

A bunch of red creatures with a spirit of defiance invade the data world. And CANO is going to beat them. But
CANO has no arms, or magic. Therefore, he needs to use his feet to run and guide the enemy's weapons to kill the enemy.

Understanding attack methods



Move, guide weapons to hit enemies, but be careful, while also dealing damage to the player.

KILL 8 bosses, then you can use their weapons to clean up the remaining forces.

features


-Can be archived at any time.
-The operation is simple, just move and mouse click to upgrade.
-Relatively good sense of blow.

operating instructions


-WASD moves, left mouse button to purchase upgrades.

In addition
